poker.object

Class Fighting

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.object.Fighting

  • public class Fighting
extends java.lang.Object
    Fighting is a fighting of two hand card.

    • Method Detail

      • validFighting

        public boolean validFighting()
        Check the fighting is valid or not
        Returns:
        TRUE if the fighting is valid
        FALSE if in two hand has two cards same id or has an invalid hand

      • beatRank

        public int beatRank()
        Two hand fight by rank.
        Returns:
        1: if the rank of hand 1 is bigger than hand 2
        2: if the rank of hand 2 is bigger than hand 1
        0: if the rank of hand 1 equal to the rank of hand 2
        -1: if there's an error

      • beat

        public int beat()
        Get the hand is winer finally.
        Returns:
        1: if the hand 1 is winer
        2: if the hand 2 is winer
        0: if the two hands are fair
        -1: if there's an error
